game.name: Help Rococo
game.shortDescription: Rococo, who was rejected for confessing in reality, discovered a game where she could kill people at will. After setting her favorite boy as a game character, she fell into endless demands and venting.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Rococo, who was rejected for confessing in reality, discovered a game where she could kill people at will. After setting her favorite boy as a game character, she fell into endless demands and venting.
